00019 #ifndef _FDOTOPOLOGY_H_
00020 #define _FDOTOPOLOGY_H_
00021 
00022 #include <FdoStd.h>
00023 #include "fdo/Schema/ClassDefinition.h"
00024 
00025 /// \brief
00026 /// This class is used to represent a topology.
00027 /// \note
00028 /// This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is
00029 /// no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change
00030 /// the software related to the content herein.
00031 class FdoTopology : public FdoClassDefinition
00032 {
00033     public:
00034     /// Constructor
00035     FdoTopology(
00036     /// The topology name.
00037         GisString * name, 
00038     /// The topology description.
00039         GisString * description, 
00040     /// The name of the spatial context from which to aquire spatial
00041     /// parameters for the topology.
00042         GisString * spatialContext
00043     );
00044 
00045     /// Get the name of the node primitive feature class for this topology.
00046     GisString * GetNodeClassName();
00047 
00048     /// Get the name of the edge primitive feature class for this topology.
00049     GisString * GetEdgeClassName();
00050 
00051     /// Get the name of the face primitive feature class for this topology.
00052     GisString * GetFaceClassName();
00053 
00054     /// Get the name of the spatial context for this topology.
00055     GisString * GetSpatialContextName();
00056 
00057     /// Set the name of the spatial context for this topology. The spatial
00058     /// context must already exist.
00059     void SetSpatialContextName(
00060         GisString * spatialContextName
00061     );
00062 
00063     private:
00064     /// The system-generated name of the feature class for node primitives in
00065     /// this topology.
00066     GisString * nodeClassName;
00067 
00068     /// The system-generated name of the feature class for edge primitives in
00069     /// this topology.
00070     GisString * edgeClassName;
00071 
00072     /// The system-generated name of the feature class for face primitives in
00073     /// this topology.
00074     GisString * faceClassName;
00075 
00076     /// The name of the spatial context in which the topology’s spatial data is
00077     /// defined.  The spatial context is used to acquire extents, coordinate
00078     /// system and internal tolerances.  It is also used as the common reference
00079     /// for spatial queries that span more than one topological feature class.
00080     GisString * spatialContextName;
00081 
00082     /// Public non-API functions for XML support
00083 
00084     /// Initialize the class from its XML attributes
00085     virtual void InitFromXml(const GisString* classTypeName, FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00086     virtual void InitFromXml(FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext, GisXmlAttributeCollection* attrs);
00087 
00088     /// Handle sub-elements such as properties
00089     /// Element start
00090     virtual GisXmlSaxHandler* XmlStartElement(
00091         GisXmlSaxContext* context, 
00092         GisString* uri, 
00093         GisString* name, 
00094         GisString* qname, 
00095         GisXmlAttributeCollection* atts
00096     );
00097     /// Element end
00098     virtual GisBoolean XmlEndElement(
00099         GisXmlSaxContext* context, 
00100         GisString* uri, 
00101         GisString* name, 
00102         GisString* qname
00103     );
00104 
00105     /// Serialize this class to XML.
00106     virtual void _writeXml( FdoSchemaXmlContext* pContext );
00107 
00108 protected:
00109     /// \brief
00110     /// Dispose this object.
00111     /// 
00112     /// \return
00113     /// Returns nothing
00114     /// 
00115     virtual void Dispose ();
00116  
00117  /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00118     /// Hide default constructor to ensure that it cannot be used.
00119     FdoTopology() {};
00120     virtual ~FdoTopology();
00121 
00122     /// FdoFeatureSchema::RejectChanges() support
00123     virtual void    _StartChanges();
00124     virtual void    _BeginChangeProcessing();
00125     virtual void    _AcceptChanges();
00126     virtual void    _RejectChanges();
00127     virtual void    _EndChangeProcessing();
00128  /// \endcond
00129 };
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133 #endif /* _FDOTOPOLOGY_H_ */
